description:
Rocked by the truth of his dearest friend`s fate, Ki is overcome by nightmares that leave him unconscious and could prevent him from ever awakening again. Keika, the only one who can save him, dives into Ki`s memories to try and free him from the nightmares. Silently, Keika watches from the sidelines as he relives Ki`s memories from before he knew him to see just what in his past is preventing Ki from moving forward. As his bodyguard, Shinryuu Shouken spent a great deal of time with Ki, but what were his true motives?
Source: crunchyroll
